item.title: National Open Science Festival - Save the Date!
item.description: Deadlines: Open Call submission: March 10th, 2020 Notification of acceptance or rejection: March 31st, 2020 Registration opens: April 2nd, 2020 The National Open Science Festival provides researchers the opportunity to learn about the benefits of different Open Science practices. It is a place to meet peers that are already working openly or that are interested to start doing so. Key to this day is sharing knowledge and best practices.
